type:
∀ {X Y : Set Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem X x → Set.instMembership.mem Y (f x)) →
    (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem X x → Eq (g (f x)) x) →
      ∀ {x₀ y₀ : Real},
        Set.instMembership.mem X x₀ →
          Eq (f x₀) y₀ →
            ∀ (x : Nat → Real),
              (∀ (n : Nat), And (Set.instMembership.mem X (x n)) (Not (Eq (x n) x₀))) →
                Filter.Tendsto x Filter.atTop (nhds x₀) →
                  ∀ (n : Nat), And (Set.instMembership.mem Y (Function.comp f x n)) (Not (Eq (Function.comp f x n) y₀))
name: Chapter10
inverse_function_theorem

type:
∀ {X Y : Set Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem X x → Set.instMembership.mem Y (f x)) →
    (∀ (y : Real), Set.instMembership.mem Y y → Set.instMembership.mem X (g y)) →
      (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem X x → Eq (g (f x)) x) →
        (∀ (y : Real), Set.instMembership.mem Y y → Eq (f (g y)) y) →
          ∀ {x₀ y₀ f'x₀ : Real},
            Set.instMembership.mem X x₀ →
              Eq (f x₀) y₀ →
                Ne f'x₀ 0 →
                  ClusterPt x₀ (Filter.principal (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀))) →
                    HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
                      ContinuousWithinAt g Y y₀ → HasDerivWithinAt g (instHDiv.hDiv 1 f'x₀) Y y₀
name: Chapter10
inverse_function_theorem

type:
∀ {X Y : Set Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  (∀ (y : Real), Set.instMembership.mem Y y → Eq (f (g y)) y) →
    ∀ {x₀ y₀ f'x₀ : Real},
      Eq (f x₀) y₀ →
        (∀ (a : Nat → Real),
            (∀ (n : Nat), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀)) (a n)) →
              Filter.Tendsto a Filter.atTop (nhds x₀) →
                Filter.Tendsto (fun n => instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub (f (a n)) (f x₀)) (instHSub.hSub (a n) x₀))
                  Filter.atTop (nhds f'x₀)) →
          ContinuousWithinAt g Y y₀ →
            Chapter9.AdherentPt y₀ (Set.instSDiff.sdiff Y (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton y₀)) →
              ∀ (y : Nat → Real),
                (∀ (n : Nat),
                    Set.instMembership.mem (Set.instSDiff.sdiff Y (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton y₀)) (y n)) →
                  (∀ (n : Nat), Set.instMembership.mem Y (y n)) →
                    Set.instMembership.mem Y y₀ →
                      (∀ (n : Nat),
                          Set.instMembership.mem (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀))
                            ((fun n => g (y n)) n)) →
                        Filter.Tendsto (fun n => g (y n)) Filter.atTop (nhds (g y₀)) →
                          Chapter9.AdherentPt x₀ (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀)) →
                            Eq (g y₀) x₀ →
                              ∀ (n : Nat),
                                Eq (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub (g (y n)) (g y₀)) (instHSub.hSub (y n) y₀))
                                  (Real.instInv.inv
                                    (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub (f ((fun n => g (y n)) n)) (f x₀))
                                      (instHSub.hSub ((fun n => g (y n)) n) x₀)))
name: Chapter10
inverse_function_theorem
_proof_1_8
